title: Best of the Program | Guests: Michael Shellenberger & John Ziegler | 10/31/22
description:
Pat Gray joins the guys to go over Paul Pelosi's attacker, his possible ideological leanings, and the media's manipulation of the story. Author of "San Fransicko" Michael Shellenberger dives deep into the attack on Paul Pelosi and the dangers of nationalizing oil and gas. "The Death Of Journalism" co-host John Ziegler joins to give his unique take on Paul Pelosi's attacker and the journalistic standards he uses.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
